description: The .NET Framework 4.7 Developer Pack lets developers build applications that target the .NET Framework 4.7 by using Visual Studio 2015, or third-party IDEs. This is a single package that bundles the .NET Framework 4.7, the .NET 4.7 Targeting Pack, and the .NET Framework 4.7 SDK.
summary: The .NET Framework 4.7 Developer Pack lets developers build applications that target the .NET Framework 4.7.
author: Microsoft
